content:
Estimated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: I think I will give up my oldest email address. 100 spam messages a day is just not much fun anymore...
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 2:
Text: @emilyryandavis People smirked @ my trusty old guy. I love him, but his buttons are dying  Plus, the bulk when traveling SUCKS
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 3:
Text: dude, my dad just totally gave me his old PDA, which MEANS I can TWAT where ever I want that has wifi, like STARBUCKS. LOVE my life
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 4:
Text: off to spend my morning with 5 year olds...my favorite is the tiny one with the big brown eyes
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 5:
Text: @Cortnee4Christ It's like the old myspace days. You gotta go to a specific person's page, and comment to them that way.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 6:
Text: @JEFFHARDYBRAND legend Jeff! What you reckon to Kat (ECW), old UK mate from York! Olden days
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: @theotherlily  I hope client    Orrr maybe he's an old buddy of Shawn's dad..that need help?
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 8:
Text: http://twitpic.com/6geas - At old town with my peabody!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 9:
Text: doing a little old othing. Going to bed fresh and clean ...my day starts late tomorrow
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 10:
Text: Great day :p Band played, ate some uber good food & caught up with old friends  Too bad it was so fuckin' hot all day lol... Nite nite
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: No one in West Virginia was afraid of growing old that I could see or sense.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 12:
Text: @einsteinboi - thanks! We feel so old
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 13:
Text: fucking long ass time. Feel like im not good enough or just plain old used. w/e, time to get over him i guess
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 14:
Text: Just decided to take down my home machine to update to #fedora 11, and switch from dead lcd to old crt. Killed my 70 day uptime though
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 15:
Text: http://twitpic.com/5ofz5 - children playing 'round the old fountain.
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 16:
Text: aah my new headphones are lovely. Nothing is as good as the old broken set however
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 17:
Text: @Lunie380   @MzKiana it's awesome to see a young married couple with children sold out to Jesus(& enjoying life). Y'all be encouraged
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 18:
Text: @rereality Of course I remember..and as you can tell, my old ways have not subsided! Lol. Have fun drinking! I'll be working
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 19:
Text: Really sad 'cause one of my best friends and the singer of my old band is moving away after the summer.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 20:
Text: miss my old days when i'm in 2nd grade
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 21:
Text: We're going to start to shoot a pretty, young blonde now
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 22:
Text: don't ask my why i have a new account...it's cuz twitter is LAME and my old one got deleted somehow.  wah wah wah
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 23:
Text: @BeauGiles since when do you care?  you should look up an old CH10 show called 'Breakers' for the male version
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 24:
Text: my knees and elbow hurt, i have the bones of an 75 year old!
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 25:
Text: looking forward to having a good old spree in meadowhall with @AniNicholas
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 26:
Text: trying to remember the lyrics of a song with the world cinderella... i know is a old song, light rock, but arghh can't remember
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 27:
Text: so excited to catch up with some old friends tonight!  haven't seen them in a while
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 28:
Text: im currenty editing pics and listening to old hannah montana songs
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 29:
Text: @tehlinker it was tough being younger than you for sooo long... thanks for the bday wishes!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: @helsinkiwinner Yes, I think tonight I'll close the door and place her bed outside. She's not even 9 weeks old, so it's heartbreaking.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Human-Rated Examples:
Example 1:
Text: @KevinRay rub it in now...I had 2 do mine the old fashioned way, & in the heat LOL  Yea U have no excuses so tom grab that beer &.....
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 2:
Text: @rainydaydesign You are too talented!  every time I see a new blog design from you I want to buy it.even though mine is only 1 month old
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 3:
Text: The 14 year10 mth old kid rec'd a plaque, certif. & LETTER for her tennis exploits. Problem is..she didn't tell us of party until after
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 4:
Text: Stood @ Bolton bus station n just been mistaken for a coach driver by a posse of old dears
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 5:
Text: just uploaded a really old photo of herself on Twitter as a display picture. Hahaha. Oh I miss my long hair.
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 6:
Text: @giaaaa haha yayy  i watched some saved by the bell, and did u ever hear of the old kids show eureka's castle?? i made my friend watch it!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 7:
Text: ok so rainbow or sesame street which one rocked your lil world when young
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 8:
Text: @miss_holleewood i want my old life backkkkkkk
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 9:
Text: dude, LUKE is married. Faithfully and happily married. To a very smart young lady. Business major, too  wonder if she's in D-Pi?
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 10:
Text: I dropped my telstea phone on the ground and shattered it, one day old, I need to get a new one
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 11:
Text: i miss my old cuts & my relaxer
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 12:
Text: Busy busy day, but have gotten a lot done but just wanna b home  just had lunch w/ an old friend, she looked so good, so glad 2 c her!
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 13:
Text: @donnieklang you took me waaaaay back with Salute Your Shorts & Kids Inc!! LOL you're a lot older that I thought apparently!  xoxox
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 14:
Text: am watching a real old funny movie
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 15:
Text: @kuttyedathi> My 2 yr old boy is sleeping and the music plays ' if u r happy & u know it clap ur hands ' and he is clapping!
Annotation from annotator: 4

Example 16:
Text: Me & my friends used to ask ea other "What club we hittin' tonight?" Now, it's "How's your cholesterol level?" ..we're old
Annotation from annotator: 3

Example 17:
Text: @Krazie_x360a Forfeit lolol I DON"T QUIT!!! I just Can't Whore achievement's like i use to  I think I'm getting old lol
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 18:
Text: @deanm1987 Hey twit! Just watched poor Holly on Britains Got Talent  poor thing!! People are so mean - she only a 10 year old little girl!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 19:
Text: @brahhh quit smoking cigs... i dont want to look old  plus... i cant breath haha
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 20:
Text: @thatkliqkid Nice....Im too young  Cant go til Im at least 17 probably. But hey. I've got plenty of time. Can't believe Fozzy played once.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 21:
Text: @Kishez I am too young but I will definately make some virgin strawberry margeritas that day!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 22:
Text: @MICHAELKTHNXBAI yep  No wonder they're having to sleep in their van cos they can't afford a hotel,lol. Better play the old stuff tonight!
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 23:
Text: 90's flashback... listening to old punk rock pop of the 90's
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 24:
Text: Oh MAN !! I was going to connect my old school Nintendo to play mario games. And is not in the bag I gotta search for it.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 25:
Text: @smithtk yeap. But storytelling is 5000 years old, right? Lavoisier's law working perfectly  #nml09
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 26:
Text: I want to see king blues at the "electric ballroom" in london but ill get crushed.  I hate being a 14 year old that looks like an 8 yr old
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 27:
Text: @alex91AAM lol yeah. Man it was the ONLY Orang Utan pluchie that I found. Thank god I saw it once during my older trips to the mall.
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 28:
Text: You cough twice, and people ask if you've got swine flu. This gets really old after a while
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 29:
Text: @mileycyrus - so.. @xMileyCyrus was your old twitter right...?! meaning when you replied to me on there, it was actually you!?!
Annotation from annotator: 2

Example 30:
Text: Feels very akward at bbt.....only white person and the old people are glaring at me
Annotation from annotator: 1

Target Example:
Text: It's how, with every passing day, I look more like my mother in her young age and I'm not pleased about that.
Annotation from annotator:
